full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Cormant-CS or Equivalent for the Department of National Defence**

**Reference Number:** SSC-23-00023227:T

**Competitive Solicitation Method:** Open bidding

**Publication Date:** July 10, 2023

**Closing Date:** July 21, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

**Contracting Authority:** Shared Services Canada

**Materials and Services to be Acquired:** Cormant-CS or equivalent, including its software, services, and support.

**Description:** This solicitation is for the purchase of Cormant-CS or an equivalent solution. Interested bidders can register on the SSC P2P Portal to access and submit their responses.

**Registering to Respond:**

To register, please follow these steps:

1. Visit the SSC P2P Portal: [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login)
2. Click on the "Register Now" button
3. Complete the required registration form and create your account

**Important Notes:**

* Amendment 001 has been made to correct the French title of the solicitation.
* The successful bidder(s) will be required to provide the specified software, services, and support to the Department of National Defence.
* The contract will be awarded based on a competitive selection process, and the deadline for submission is July 21, 2023.

**Trade Agreements:**

This solicitation is open to all qualified bidders, and is subject to the terms and conditions of the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Contact Information:**

For inquiries, please contact Javier Ventura at:

Phone: 343-576-9329
Fax: 343-576-9329
Email: [javier.ventura@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:javier.ventura@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
Address: 180 Kent St, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1P 1B6

Let me know if you need another thing! 

Best,
Your friendly Tech Writer friend
